about_the_game:
You're a froggy creature searching for your family! Hop your way between mushrooms and lily pads as you carve your own path through the colorful yet dangerous swamp.
To survive you'll need to be fast, precise, and froggy to avoid all the dangers... especially the water!

Utilize your skills

With a persistent Bird chasing you and lurking Piranhas waiting below, you'll need every ounce of dexterity to survive and progress on this challenging journey - especially when bothersome Mosquitoes join the chase!

Freedom of movement

Unlike other Precision Platformers where paths are predetermined, in Swamp Up, you're free for forging your own unique path through the swamp!

Game Features:

  • Power-ups: Find power-ups scattered throughout the map, to aid in your journey.
  • Multiple Levels: Unlock new maps as you advance, each with its own set of unique challenges that demand different strategies from the player!
  • Upgrades: Spend emblems acquired during your adventure to purchase upgrades that persist through your adventures!
  • Procedurally Generated Maps: No matter which direction you explore, a path forward always exists, ensuring each playthrough is dynamic and unpredictable.
  • Records System: Challenge yourself to achieve the greatest distances in the shortest time possible!
  • Replayability: Procedural Generation ensures replay value and engagement beyond unlocking every level!
  • Skins: Find NPCs and unlock new skins to use in your adventures!
  • Achievements: Unlock Steam Achievements!

legal_notice: Swamp Up and all related characters, images and gameplay sequences shown are property of Torress Studios.
name: Swamp Up

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 3.5GHz / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G 3.5GHz or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti 4GB or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 8GB or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Jump between mushrooms, collect power-ups and break records while exploring your own path through a procedurally generated map in this fun yet challenging Precision Platformer with Roguelite elements. Be fast, precise, and skillful to avoid all of its dangers. And remember, never touch the water.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Spanish - Spain*, Spanish - Latin America*, Turkish*, Korean*, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
